name: @tadayosi/artemis-plugin-npm
description: Artemis plugin module for the Hawtio web console

scripts.prebuild: echo 'removing dist' && rm -rf dist/ && echo 'downloading artemis-plugin.war' && mvn clean package && echo 'filtering src/*.js' && mvn resources:resources
scripts.build: parcel build --no-source-maps -o artemis-plugin.js target/plugin/js/*.js target/plugin/js/**/*.js target/classes/*.js
